parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: (string) ID of the run to fetch. Must be provided.

parameters.name: run_uuid
parameters.description: [Deprecated, use run_id instead] ID of the run to fetch. This field will be removed in a future MLflow version.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Gets the metadata, metrics, params, and tags for a run. In the case where multiple metrics with the same key are logged for a run, return only the value with the latest timestamp.
